recipesJson.name: Simply Cannoli
recipesJson.author: tranceinate
recipesJson.description: A basic cannoli recipe limited to 6 flavours from FW, FA, TFA, Cap, & INW Biscuit

reviews.text: Great flavor!  I'm keeping a 120ml of this on hand at all times.  I've let others try it and everyone liked it, no negatives!
It's an enjoyable and rather authentic taste at just over 8% flavoring.  Impressive!
This has been the only juice my buddy has vaped since this recipe came out. Impressive Cannoli!
This is really great as is, but I want to expand at some point by adding a kiss of lemon to brighten the cream like a true cannoli. Very well done my friend!!
This is my favorite cannoli out of the 8 top 10 recipes in the contest.
Ay yo fam. This juice is like totes lit, yo. Shiz on fleek.

This is absolutely outstanding my friend. Very well put together. Ready to mix a bigger batch. Didn't took to long to steep, I pu it in my sonic cleaner for 2 hr and waited 3 days to tested. Is like eating the real thing, great job @tranceinate Thank you for sharing...
The cream on this one is just plain poetry. Delicious recipe!
Mixed and steeped two weeks - totally nails the cannoli cream profile - not getting alot of the pastry shell but loving the flavor anyway!
Delicious, didn't stop until a full 60 was gone. Making a 120 so i can see what it's like after it ages a few weeks.  This recipe got me interested in custards again.

I mixed this up 3 days ago and only have about 10 ml's of the 30 left. It's very yummy, Nailed the Cannnoli profile! I'm mixing a 120 right now, want to see what a few week steep does to it.
Thanks Trance.
Pretty good recipe. I happily vaped through 100ml of this and it's fairly spot on. The use of CAP NY Cheesecake and CAP Vanilla Custard mimics the cream of a cannoli very well.
